Interface JavaSender

    public interface JavaSender

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getServerURL()
      Returns the current configured server URL
      void send(UnifiedMessage unifiedMessage)
      Sends the given payload to installations of the referenced PushApplication.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(UnifiedMessage unifiedMessage,
        MessageResponseCallback callback)
        Sends the given payload to installations of the referenced PushApplication. We also pass a MessageResponseCallback to handle the message
        Parameters:
        unifiedMessage - the UnifiedMessage to send.
        callback - the MessageResponseCallback.

      • send

        void send(UnifiedMessage unifiedMessage)
        Sends the given payload to installations of the referenced PushApplication.
        Parameters:
        unifiedMessage - The UnifiedMessage to send.

      • getServerURL

        String getServerURL()
        Returns the current configured server URL
        Returns:
        the current configured server URL.

      • setServerURL

        void setServerURL(String serverURL)
        Set the new server URL
        Parameters:
        serverURL - the new server url the sender will bind to.
